text: Pedro de Verona Rodrigues Pires (; born 29 April 1934) was the President of Cape Verde from March 2001 to September 2011. Before becoming President, he was Prime Minister from 1975 to 1991."Presidente cabo-verdiano prudente sobre Estados Unidos de √Åfrica", Panapress, May 28, 2008 . ==References== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Cape Verde Category:Prime ministers of Cape Verde
title: Pedro Pires
